articles.title: Hello World
articles.contents:
Hi! My name is Harry Fisher. Thanks for visiting my site. I have a passion for data science (especially all things R) and this site is a place where I like to share things I find interesting. I currently work as a data scientist in Cardiff, Wales. Previously, I completed my PhD at Cardiff Metropolitan University in December 2019, investigating risk factors associated with sports injury.
Feel free to get in touch if any of the posts catch your interest!
R packages
bitmexr: R Client for the BitMEX Exchange 
poweRof10: Tools to scrape data from www.thepowerof10.info 
Research
Fisher et al. In press. An interdisciplinary examination of stress and injury in athletes.
Fisher et al. 2016. Relationship between Force Production during Isometric Squats and Knee Flexion Angles during Landing. Journal of Strength and Conditioning. [pdf]
Contact

Blog
My personal website / blog. Based on the distill theme by Rstudio.
